about_the_game:
Ameena: Witchborn Duelist - Your Card for Vengeance


Immerse yourself in the evolving world of "Ameena: Witchborn Duelist," a captivating card game woven into the dark tapestry of fantasy and mystery. Step into the shoes of Ameena, the progeny of a witch and a formidable demon, as you navigate the nascent realms of the afterworlds. Your quest is one of vengeance, seeking retribution against the demon who obliterated your mother's existence. Each level presents a unique challenge, with procedurally generated landscapes ensuring a fresh experience with every playthrough.

Be prepared to be captivated by the game's exquisite, atmospheric graphics and compelling soundscapes, currently under development to bring the shadowy realm to life. Every element, from the immersive backgrounds to the detailed characters, is meticulously crafted to create an unforgettable atmosphere.

Game Mechanics and Strategy


"Ameena: Witchborn Duelist" invites you to embark on a strategic journey, offering the opportunity to build a personalized deck from a selection of approximately 200 unique cards, categorized into six distinct types:



  • Attack Cards: Inflict damage on your opponents with these single-use cards.
  • Spell Cards: Cast spells with lasting effects to strategize over multiple turns.
  • Trap Cards: Block your opponents' moves and open up strategic planning opportunities.
  • Boost Cards: Enhance your abilities, strength, and attributes.
  • Shielding Cards: Defend against your opponents' attacks and introduce new defensive tactics.
  • Hero Cards: Unlock special cards that offer unique abilities and turn the tide of battle.

Evolving Challenges and Realms


The game's dynamism is fueled by procedurally generated maps and battle rooms, allowing you to start your adventure in the less perilous realms of hell, each imbued with a unique type of magic that introduces diverse challenges and adversaries.

Customization and Progression


Achieving victory on each level allows you to choose new paths and gain access to a magical shop, where you can purchase artifacts like magical books or elixirs to strengthen yourself. Moreover, you have the ability to modify your cards with acquired powers, adding a layer of depth to your strategy.

With each subsequent level, the difficulty escalates, offering new opportunities for shopping and card customization. This turn-based game hinges on strategic card use, with the ultimate goal of defeating the main boss to avenge Ameena's mother's death, navigating through a series of increasingly challenging obstacles.

Join the Saga of Ameena


Join the saga of Ameena's courageous journey now and be a part of shaping a world where every decision you make carves the path to restoring balance in a realm engulfed by chaos. Do you have the mettle to face the fearsome Necroth and exact justice?

name: Ameena: Witchborn Duelist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: i5-9600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070, Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended SSD or better

short_description: Embark on a dark fantasy quest, navigating procedurally generated realms. Master strategic card duels to avenge your mother against the underworld's greatest demon. Experience a blend of magic, strategy, and deep revenge in this ever-evolving adventure.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
